summary: An Ordinance providing for the condemnation, appropriation and taking of the fee simple title of certain real estate for the purpose of the construction of retaining walls, drains, ditches, culverts and slopes thereon, and bulkheading, piling, surfacing, terracing and otherwise improving the same in order to protect certain streets, alleys, highways and parks in the City of Seattle, and to prevent the same from being injured, damages or obstructed, and to use said property after it is so improved for a public park and for any other public use after just compensation having first been made or paid into court for the owners thereof.
